FuncDef: The display fr lmi-info command displays LMI statistics.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type and number of an interface.
Currently, only POS interfaces are supported, excluding sub-interfaces.

Examples: Frame relay LMI statistics for interface Pos1/0/0 (DTE, Q933)
Frame relay LMI statistics for interface Pos1/0/1 (DCE, Q933)
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Local Management Interface (LMI) is a protocol that uses status enquiry messages and state messages to maintain link and PVC status, including adding PVC status information, deleting information about disconnected PVCs, monitoring PVC status changes, and checking link integrity. After LMI and parameters are configured on an FR interface, run the
display fr lmi-info command to check whether the configurations are correct.
If no interface is specified, configurations about all FR interfaces are displayed.If interface-type interface-number is specified, only information about this FR interface is displayed.

Prerequisites
The LMI protocol and relevant parameters have been configured.
